Name: Indexed Customer IC hors BP
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(EXCEPT(DESCENDANTS(STRTOMEMBER("[SLS_CUSTOMER].[" + [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer IC]) + "]")) , DESCENDANTS([SLS_CUSTOMER].[IC1 - E00070])) , 0) , ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group])))) AND ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Indexed Customer] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[zIndexed_Customer])))))}
